parameters.name: InitialFileName
parameters.description: Path and file name of the file to open

parameters.name: FileFilter
parameters.description: File name extension of the file to open

parameters.name: OpenOptions
parameters.description: Open options as defined by swGetOpenFileNameOptions_e

parameters.name: ConfigName
parameters.description: Name of configuration of InitialFileName; comma-separated list of sheet names beginning with active sheet if OpenOptions is swGetOpenFileNameOptions_e.swGetOpenFileNameOptions_SelectedSheets

parameters.name: DisplayName
parameters.description: Recommended name to use for opened file

title: ISldWorks.GetOpenFileName2
description: Prompts the user for the name of the file to open.
signature:

   System.String
DialogTitle
,
   System.String
InitialFileName
,
   System.String
FileFilter
,
   out System.Int32
OpenOptions
,
   out System.String
ConfigName
,
   out System.String
DisplayName
,
   out System.String
DisplayStateName
)

parameters.name: InitialFileName
parameters.description: Path and file name of the file to open

parameters.description: File name extension of the file to open

parameters.name: ConfigName
parameters.description: Name of configuration of InitialFileName; comma-separated list of sheet names beginning with active sheet if OpenOptions is swGetOpenFileNameOptions_e.swGetOpenFileNameOptions_SelectedSheets
